eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.jdbc

Class JdbcConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.jdbc.JdbcConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataConnector

    public class JdbcConnector
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDataConnector
    Class that defines all methods available by a JDBC Database connector. Every JDBC connection to any DBMS should support the same query functionality.

      Query that fetches only the first result; Assuming that one value is only needed.
      java.lang.String getDbSystem()
      Provides the name of the DBMS (e.g., POSTGRESQL, ORACLE) to which this connection is established.

      • findSingletonValue

        Query that fetches only the first result; Assuming that one value is only needed.
        Specified by:
        findSingletonValue in interface IDataConnector
        Parameters:
        sql - An SQL command for the SELECT query.
        Returns:

      • getPrimaryKeyColumn

        public java.lang.String getPrimaryKeyColumn(java.lang.String tableName)
        Assuming that primary key is a single attribute (column) for the given table name, this method can retrieve it.
        Parameters:
        tableName - The name of the table in the DBMS.
        Returns:
        The name of the primary key column.
